page.title: 05ACTIVITIES,LICKEY/CATSHILL
page.content: (continued) sledging.There are also many wooded walks and bridle paths over the hills. At Marlbrook there is a recreation ground with a football pitch and playground. {Recreation/Sport Sport is popular in our area.There is Cofton Squash Centre which has indoor courts,a swimming pool and saunas.There is also a golf course ,bowling green and tennis courts at the old Rose and Crown down Rose Hill. Altogether our area has a good range of sports facilities. {Entertainment There is an amateur dramatic group at Lickey Church hall. Their last production was "Puss in Boots",a pantomime.Currently, Lickey Middle School is performing "Joseph and the Amazing Technicolour Dreamcoat".
